title: Lavender Wild Flower Shirt, Lavender Floral Graphic Tee, Lavender Floral Shirt, Flower T-shirt, Wild Flower Shirt, Gift For Her
description:
Gift For Her Shirt ↝ Beautiful Lavender Wild Flower Shirt


A fashionable T-Shirt made exclusively for the modern woman. Wear this comfortable tee and make a statement! Trendy and stylish, appropriate for a morning to evening look.


A true must-have piece for your wardrobe as it could be worn in multiple ways by women of any age and style. You can wear it all year long if you pair it with the appropriate garments and/or accessories.
Ideal gift for your wife, friend, girlfriend or even your mom!


⇝ WE LOVE OUR FOLLOWERS ❤️
Follow our shop for the latest t'shirt


You aren’t convinced yet?
Then you should know that this awesome T-Shirt comes in different sizes and color variations!
Side seamed with crew neck, shoulder taping, and normal fit. Soft, comfortable, lightweight, and designed with love!
Made to order, the design is printed directly onto the tee! It use DGT printing technology for the best quality print.

We use Bella+Canvas 3001 T-shirts, made of superior combed and ring-spun cotton.

⇢ Plain colors: 100% airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 32 single 4.2 oz.
⇢ Heather CVC Colors: 52% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 48% poly, 32 single 4.2 oz.
⇢ Ath. Heather and Black Heather CVC: 90% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 10% poly, 32 single 4.2 oz.
⇢ Heather Prism Colors: 99% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 1% poly, 32 single 4.2 oz.
⇢ Heather Prism Blue: 90% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 10% polyester, 32 single 4.2 oz.


If you like what you see then you will LOVE our other Tees!
Find them all here:
[ https://ashirta.etsy.com ]


⇝ PROCESSING TIME - PACKAGING - DELIVERY
Your tee will be ready for shipping within [1] to [5] working days following your order.
In very rare cases, the processing of your order may take a little longer. In this case, we will properly update you through the Etsy messaging system.

Your T-Shirt will be carefully folded and packaged to safely arrive at your doorstep.


If you have any questions at all, you need any kind of help to place your order, or you need your tee delivered before/on a specific date, please contact us before your purchase.
We’ll be happy to answer your questions, and assist you through the checkout process.
We pride ourselves on offering high-quality garments and a superior level of customer service.


⇝ HOW TO MEASURE
1. Take a tee you already own and it fits you well.
2. Lay it down the T-Shirt on a flat hard surface and smooth out any wrinkles you might see.
3. Measure the length by measuring from the highest point of the shoulder to the desired hemline.
4. Measure the chest width by placing the tape close under the arms and measure from one side to another.
5. Record the measurements and compare them to the ones listed on our size guide below.
* Size down one if you'd like a tighter fit.

⇝ SIZE GUIDE
XS = Length: 27 in - 68.58 cm | Chest: 16.5 in - 41.91 cm
S = Length: 28 in - 71.12 cm | Chest: 18 in - 45.72 cm
M = Length: 29 in - 73.66 cm | Chest: 20 in - 50.80 cm
L = Length: 30 in - 76.20 cm | Chest: 22 in - 55.88 cm
XL = Length: 31 in - 78.74 cm | Chest: 24 in - 60.96 cm
2XL = Length: 32 in - 81.28 cm | Chest: 26 in - 66.04 cm
3XL = Length: 33 in - 83.82 cm | Chest: 28 in - 71.12 cm
4XL = Length: 34 in - 86.36 cm | Chest: 30 in - 76.20 cm


⇝ CARE INSTRUCTIONS
* WASHING: Machine wash lukewarm or cold, inside-out, gentle cycle with mild detergent and similar colors.
* DRYING: Hang-dry for the longest life or tumble-dry on low.
* IRONING: Medium iron inside-out ONLY if necessary. Do NOT iron the design area.
⇝ DON’Ts:
* Do NOT use bleach
* Do NOT use fabric softeners
* Do NOT dry clean

- Color Disclaimer

Various factors such as your screen resolution, color settings, display type, lighting conditions during photoshoot, and the fact that each person sees colors differently, can all affect how the colors are displayed on the Internet. Consequently, actual colors may slightly vary.

title: Funny 60th Birthday T Shirt 2024 Shirt Vintage 1964 Aged To Perfection sizes Small - 6XL BY301
description:
Funny 60th Birthday T Shirt 2024 Shirt Vintage 1964 Aged To Perfection, superb birthday gift idea that will be loved by family and friends of a certain vintage. No birthday is complete without the customary birthday tee and this classic is a favourite for 60 year olds, the retro colours and style catches the era perfectly. Available in three colours, black, midnight navy, military green and in nine sizes. Expertly printed with care and attention to detail for vibrancy and durability on a short sleeved, crew neck, soft cotton classic tee.


Sizing Information (to fit chest size)
S 36-38
M 40
L 42
XL 44
2XL 46-48
3XL 50-52
4XL 54-56
5XL 58-60
6XL 62-64

title: Horse lovers Hooded Sweatshirt
description:
If it’s not about horses, I’m not interested,
This unisex heavy blend hooded sweatshirt is relaxation itself. Made with a thick blend of cotton and polyester, it feels plush, soft and warm, a perfect choice for any cold day. In the front, the spacious kangaroo pocket adds daily practicality while the hood's drawstring is the same color as the base sweater for extra style points.
.: Made with a medium-heavy fabric (8.0 oz/yd² (271 g/m²)) that consists of 50% cotton and 50% polyester for that cozy feel and warmth you need in a hoodie.
.: The classic fit along with the pouch pocket and the tear-away label make for a highly comfortable, scratch-free wearing experience.
.: The color-matched drawcord and the double-lined hood add a stylish flair and durability that tie everything together.
.: Made using 100% ethically grown US cotton. Gildan is also a proud member of the US Cotton Trust Protocol ensuring ethical and sustainable means of production. The blank tee's dyes are OEKO-TEX-certified dyes with low environmental impact.
.: Fabric blends: Heather Sport colors - 60% polyester, 40% cotton

Great for horse lovers with a lovely silhouette design.

title: FERRARI RACING JACKET - Embroidered Ferrari Racing Jacket - Authentic Formula 1 Vintage Jacket, Vintage Racing Jacket, Y2K Racing Jacket
description:
FERRARI RACING JACKET - Embroidered Ferrari Racing Jacket - Authentic Formula 1 Vintage Jacket, Vintage Racing Jacket, Y2K Racing Jacket

Boost your style with our Red Ferrari F1 Jacket and Embroidered Racing Jacket! Explore our Vintage Unisex Racing Jackets collection for Formula 1 aficionados. Ideal gifts for Y2K and 90s racing fans. Get your hands on exclusive F1 merch now! 🏁✨

Key Features:

Iconic vintage designs
Perfect gifts for racing fans
Authentic F1 merch

--PRODUCT DETAILS--
- Authentic Ferrari Design: Stand out from the crowd with our vintage F1 Ferrari jacket, crafted with iconic racing pilot details for a bold and stylish look.

- Premium Quality: Made with high-quality materials, this streetwear jacket ensures durability and comfort for long-lasting wear.

- Versatile Style: Perfect for Formula One fans, rally enthusiasts, or simply those who appreciate a classic car jacket. Suitable for both men and women.

- Timeless Appeal: Embrace the old school charm of a classic Ferrari jacket, adding a touch of retro flair to your street style.

!!FOR THE BEST FIT WE ADVICE TO SIZE UP 1-2!!

Perfect for Y2K and 90s racing fans, our jackets make an unforgettable gift for any occasion. 🎁✨ Explore our selection of F1 Merch and discover the thrill of motorsport fashion!

The clothing size is one-two sizes smaller and because it is a racing jacket, it is tighter, it is recommended to purchase two sizes larger for the beautiful streetwear/slightly oversized look :)

This racing jacket top is a perfect combination of speed and wind, bringing unparalleled style to enthusiasts in the racing world. It is not only a fashionable jacket, but also a highly functional and protective racing equipment

🏁Scuderia Ferrari 🏎❤️‍🔥 🏁High quality materials. ☑️ 🏁Embroidered patches. 🪡

title: F1 Ferrari Jacket, Ferrari Jacket, Ferrari F1, Racing Jacket, F1 Fan Jacket, Old School Jacket, Vintage F1 Ferrari Jacket, Redbull jacket
description:
GENDER NEUTRAL JACKET

🏎️ Enhance your style game with our iconic Ferrari F1 jacket, tailor-made for motorsport devotees and Formula One aficionados alike. Infused with a hint of retro charm, this racing jacket pays homage to the timeless legacy of Formula One. Merging fashion with practicality, it stands out as a bold statement piece, echoing the electrifying atmosphere of the racetrack. Whether you're cheering on your team or hitting the streets, this Ferrari jacket embodies the essence of velocity and precision. Spoil yourself or surprise a fellow racing enthusiast with this timeless treasure, an indispensable addition to any Formula One memorabilia collection.

Select one size larger than normally, if you aren't sure which size to get

🏁 Shipping 6-12 days

✍️ If you have any questions, feel free to message me here on Etsy :)

title: ICONIC TITS - Crop Top (Sassy Collection)
description:

Get ready to exude style and fun with our SASSY COLLECTION! This limited edition and exclusive line features 9 designs printed on crop tops made to highlight your curves with a touch of sensuality. Each top comes with a phrase that will make everyone perceive you as a confident, funny and independent woman and look at you with admiration. It's the perfect gift for your girlfriend, bestie or for you! Ideal for those relaxed days with friends or for an afternoon of laughter in the sun. Get yours and turn every day into a fun sexy party!

The must-have garment of the season. This t-shirt features a snug fit but remains extremely comfortable. It sits just above the navel.
• 52% combed and ring-spun cotton, 48% polyester
• Fabric weight: 122 g/m² (3.6 oz/yd²)

title: Gray Custom T-Shirt · Motivational Words T-Shirt · Gift for Him
description:
Explore our collection of gray custom t-shirts for a special gift filled with words of motivation! Everyone needs some motivation and support. On our customized T-shirts, you can add your favorite motivational words and let these inspirational words become his source of motivation.

Made from high-quality fabric, this gray T-shirt is comfortable, breathable and comfortable to wear. It is not only a fashionable piece of clothing, but also a gift full of warmth and encouragement, given to you to bring positive energy to his life.

Whether it's a birthday, holiday or just everyday, our custom T-shirts are the perfect gift choice for him. Let our motivational T-shirts be your way to express your love and support, and let your partner feel your company and encouragement!
